'''Chicken-Mushroom Skewer''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Chicken-Mushroom Skewer is available from the start of the game.

Depending on the quality, Chicken-Mushroom Skewer restores '''8'''/'''9'''/'''10'''% of Max HP and an additional '''800'''/'''1,000'''/'''1,200''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this can not target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Kaeya|Fruity Skewers}}

==Trivia==
*To celebrate [[Kaeya]]'s birthday, the official Chinese site for ''Genshin Impact'' published a blog post with [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/12147 real-life recipes] for Chicken-Mushroom Skewers, [[Fruity Skewers]], and his favorite drink, Death After Noon.
*It is one of [[Bennett]]'s favorite food.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Bennett|Favorite Food}}</ref>
